sentence.Network_en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 她患上严重的心脏病后安装了心脏起搏器。

sentence.Network_en: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的皇家轿车都装有电子自导引装置。

sentence.Network_en: He was told that the doors had been fitted incorrectly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被告知房门安装不当。

entry.def: A fitted piece of clothing is designed so that it is the same size and shape as your body rather than being loose.

example.tran: 宽松的裤子配上紧身夹克

entry.def: A fitted piece of furniture, for example a cupboard, is designed to fill a particular space and is fixed in place.

example.ex: I've re-carpeted our bedroom and added fitted wardrobes.
example.tran: 我重铺了卧室的地毯，又添置了定做的壁橱。

entry.tran: (地毯)铺满房间的，定做的，大小合适的
entry.def: A fitted carpet is cut to the same shape as a room so that it covers the floor completely.

example.ex: ...fitted carpets, central heating and double glazing.
example.tran: 定制的地毯、中央供暖和双层玻璃窗

entry.tran: (床单)大小合适的，按尺寸缝边的
entry.def: A fitted sheet has the corners sewn so that they fit over the corners of the mattress and do not have to be folded.

entry.tran: 合适的;有能力的;胜任的
entry.def: A person who is fitted to do something or fitted for something has the right qualities for it.

example.ex: Helen was ill fitted to fulfil her daughter's ideal of a gentle mother-figure.
example.tran: 海伦与她女儿理想中的温柔母亲形象相差甚远。

entry.def: If a room is fitted with objects, those objects are in the room and are normally fixed in place.

example.ex: Bedrooms are fitted with alarm pull cords to alert the manager in an emergency.
example.tran: 卧室中装有警报器拉绳，遇到紧急情况时可向经理报警。
